metadata.name: Adim Creator Room #1
metadata.description: Rob McElhenney and Keyonna Taylor join 100 creators in the inaugural Creator Room to develop the first characters of the Adimverse. The Adim Creator Room Pass is an official Adim NFT indicating membership in an Adimverse Creator Room. Members participate in the development of new character IP and share in the ownership and evolution of its future success.  Adim NFTs are provided subject to Adimâ€™s Terms of Service (https://adimverse.com/terms-of-service/).
